openfire.chat.adapter

Class FriendsAdapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • openfire.chat.adapter.FriendsAdapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter

    public class FriendsAdapter
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
    Friends adapter. It is used to process/display list of user's friends
